word_mean: 摄谱仪：用感光底片拍摄光谱的仪器
对光谱进行摄谱记录的发射光谱仪器。
将复合光分解为光谱，再用感光方法把光谱记录在光谱底版上的仪器。

sentence.Network_en: In the mass spectrograph the ions are focused onto a photographic plate.

sentence.Network_en: The grating spectrograph is built in two designs.
sentence.Network_cn: 光栅摄谱仪有两种类型.

sentence.Network_en: The application of mass spectrograph to the amylose structure analysis was reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 就质谱技术在多糖结构测定中的应用进行论述.
